attributes.action: Ensure that outlying areas are treated fairly with roll out of digital sevices.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I waited for broadband. I waited for freeview terrestrial. Now I can't get DAB radio and there is no timeline for me to receive it.
We pay the same charges and licence fee as everybody else. Why do we get a second class service?
